editor.modal.title: Modal Component
editor.modal.description: A component that allows to display other blocks inside it as a modal.
editor.modal.centered.title: Centered
editor.modal.centered.description: Set to true if component should be centered on screen
editor.modal.closeOnEsc.title: Close on Esc
editor.modal.closeOnEsc.description: Set to true if modal should close when esc key is pressed
editor.modal.closeOnOverlayClick.title: Close on overlay click
editor.modal.closeOnOverlayClick.descrip: Set to true if modal should close when pressing on outside area
editor.modal.showCloseIcon.title: Show close icon
editor.modal.showCloseIcon.description: Set to true if modal should display close icon
editor.modal.buttonLabel.title: Button Label
editor.modal.buttonLabel.description: Set the label displayed on button to open modal
editor.modal.buttonClass.title: Button class
editor.modal.buttonClass.description: Pass extra tachyon classes to button container
editor.modal.blockClass.title: Block class
editor.modal.blockClass.description: Unique class name to be appended to block classes
